about.title: About Us - Babysitter Platform
about.description: Learn more about our platform, mission and values. We help parents find verified babysitters for their children.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to popular questions about the platform, booking, payment and safety.

help.title: Help and Support
help.description: Get help with using the platform, troubleshooting, and contact our support team.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: We are a modern platform for finding and booking babysitters. Our mission is to help parents find reliable help for their children, and experienced babysitters to find work they love.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to make the process of finding a babysitter simple, safe and convenient. Every parent should be able to find a verified professional they can trust to care for their child.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: All babysitters are checked and verified before being listed on the platform.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We build trust between parents and babysitters through a transparent system of reviews and ratings.

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: Simple and intuitive interface for quickly finding and booking babysitters.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We carefully select babysitters, checking their experience, skills and references.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Parents can easily find a babysitter in their city, view profiles with photos, reviews and prices, contact the babysitter and book a service. Babysitters can create a profile, specify their schedule, prices and skills to attract clients.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Your children's safety is our priority. All babysitters are verified with documents, and the platform has a system of reviews and ratings. You can always contact the babysitter before booking to discuss all details.

forParents.title: How to find a babysitter?
forParents.content: Use the search form on the home page or go to the search section. You can filter babysitters by price, experience, skills and availability. Browse profiles with photos, reviews and prices, then contact your preferred babysitter and book a service.

howToBook.title: How to book a babysitter?
howToBook.content: After you find a suitable babysitter, click the Book button in their profile. Specify the date, time, number of children and other details. The babysitter will confirm the booking, and you can pay for the service through the platform.

pricing.title: How much does a babysitter service cost?
pricing.content: Prices vary depending on the babysitter's experience, number of children and duration of service. Each babysitter sets their own prices, which are displayed in their profile. You will be able to see the final cost before confirming the booking.

safety.title: How is safety ensured?
safety.content: All babysitters are checked and verified before being listed on the platform. The platform has a system of reviews and ratings from other parents. You can always contact the babysitter before booking to discuss all details and ask questions.

payment.title: How does payment work?
payment.content: Payment is made through a secure payment system on the platform. You can pay for the service with a bank card or another available method. Payment is processed only after the babysitter confirms the booking.

cancellation.title: Can I cancel a booking?
cancellation.content: Yes, you can cancel a booking through your account. Cancellation and refund conditions depend on the time before the service starts and are specified in the platform terms. We recommend canceling bookings as early as possible.

becomeSitter.title: How to become a babysitter?
becomeSitter.content: Register on the platform and select the Babysitter role. Fill out your profile, specify your work experience, skills, schedule and prices. After your profile is verified, you can start accepting bookings.

support.title: How to contact support?
support.content: You can contact our support team at info@sitter.ge. You can also find answers to many questions in the Help section.

help.title: Help and Support
help.intro: Welcome to the help center! Here you will find all the information you need to work with the platform.

register.title: Register
register.description: Create an account on the platform by providing your email and password. Choose a role: parent or babysitter.

search.title: Find a babysitter
search.description: Use the search form to find a suitable babysitter in your city. Apply filters to refine your search.

book.title: Book a service
book.description: Select date and time, specify the number of children and other details. Confirm the booking and make payment.

communicate.title: Communicate with the babysitter
communicate.description: Use the built-in messenger to communicate with the babysitter before the meeting and during the service.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.solution: Go to the login page and click Forgot password?. Enter your email and we will send password recovery instructions.

bookingIssues.title: Booking issues
bookingIssues.solution: If you encounter booking issues, check that the information provided is correct. If the problem persists, contact support.

paymentProblems.title: Payment problems
paymentProblems.solution: Make sure your bank card is supported by the platform and has sufficient funds. If the problem persists, contact your bank or our support team.

accountAccess.title: Cannot access account
accountAccess.solution: Check that your email and password are correct. If you forgot your password, use the recovery function. If the problem persists, contact support.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Couldn't find an answer to your question? We're always here to help!

error404.title: Page got lost
error404.description: Looks like this page went off to play with the kids. Let's find you the perfect babysitter!

card1.title: Verified babysitters
card1.description: All our babysitters undergo thorough verification

card2.title: Safety
card2.description: Your children are in the safe hands of verified professionals

card3.title: Childcare
card3.description: Thousands of happy parents trust us

batumi.title: How to Find a Babysitter in Batumi
batumi.intro: Looking for a reliable babysitter in Batumi? Our platform will help you find a verified specialist to care for your children. All babysitters are verified and have experience working with children.
batumi.stepsTitle: How to Find a Babysitter in Batumi

step1.name: Use search
step1.text: Go to the search section and specify the city of Batumi. You will be able to see all available babysitters in your city.

step2.name: Review profiles
step2.text: Browse babysitter profiles: photos, work experience, parent reviews, prices and schedule. Pay attention to the rating and number of completed orders.

step3.name: Contact the babysitter
step3.text: Write to the selected babysitter through the built-in messenger to discuss details, ask questions and arrange a meeting.

step4.name: Book a service
step4.text: Choose a convenient date and time, specify the number of children and special requirements. After confirming the booking, you can pay for the service.

batumi.advantagesTitle: Benefits of searching through our platform
advantages: Verified babysitters - all specialists are verified
Convenient search - filters by price, experience, skills and availability
Safety - review and rating system
Support 24/7 - we are always ready to help
Flexible payment - secure payments through the platform
batumi.ctaTitle: Ready to find a babysitter in Batumi?

batumi.title: How to Find a Nanny in Batumi
batumi.intro: Need a professional nanny in Batumi? Our platform offers verified specialists with experience working with children of different ages. All nannies undergo thorough screening and verification.
batumi.stepsTitle: How to Find a Nanny in Batumi

step1.name: Select Batumi city
step1.text: In the search section, specify the city of Batumi. The system will show all available nannies in your city with their profiles and schedules.

step2.name: Apply filters
step2.text: Use filters to search for a nanny by work experience, education, skills, price and availability. You can find a nanny with medical or pedagogical education.

step3.name: Review nanny profiles
step3.text: Browse detailed profiles: education, certificates, work experience, reviews from other parents, photos and prices. Pay attention to the nanny's specialization.

step4.name: Contact and book
step4.text: Write to the nanny you like, discuss all details, special requirements for childcare and book the service at a convenient time.

batumi.considerationsTitle: What to consider when choosing a nanny
considerations: Experience working with children of the required age
Education and additional certificates
Reviews and ratings from other parents
Schedule flexibility and availability
Specialization (work with infants, special needs children, etc.)

becomeBabysitter.title: How to Become a Babysitter
becomeBabysitter.intro: Join our platform and start working as a verified babysitter. We help experienced caregivers find families who need reliable childcare.

step1.name: Register on the platform
step1.text: Create an account and select the Babysitter role. Fill in your basic information and verify your identity.

step2.name: Fill out your profile
step2.text: Add your photo, work experience, education, skills and certificates. The more complete your profile, the more attractive you will be to parents.

step3.name: Set your schedule
step3.text: Specify when you are available to work. You can set a weekly schedule or mark specific dates.

step4.name: Start accepting bookings
step4.text: After your profile is verified, you will appear in search results and can start receiving booking requests from parents.

benefits: Flexible schedule - work when it's convenient for you
Fair payment - set your own rates
Verified clients - all parents are verified
Support 24/7 - we're always here to help
